Name: Honey Limeaid
Ingredients: 30 ml Honey syrup (3 parts honey to 1 water by weight)
Instructions: STIR (7 spoons of) honey with lime juice in base of shaker until honey dissolves. SHAKE with ice and strain into ice-filled glass. TOP with soda.
Review: A refreshing Mexican variation on Real Lemonade.
History: Discovered in 2005 at Hotel Quinta Real in Guadalajara, Mexico.
Nutrition: One serving of Honey Limeaid contains 78 calories
